name: Digimon Heroes!
storyline: Digimon armies from all corners of File Island have been in a perpetual struggle leaving the island in ruins. Unhappy with the state of the world, Ophanimon summons you – a crusader – to the Digital World. You get a pack of energy cards and are given the task of uniting the island.
summary: Digimon Heroes! is a mobile match-3 card battle game set in the expansive Digimon universe. Players collect and evolve digital monsters known as Digimon to build powerful teams and engage in strategic battles. Through strategic deck-building and tactical gameplay, they embark on quests, battle against other players in PvP matches, and participate in special events to earn rewards and strengthen their Digimon.
